metadata.name: Gerald Preinfalk Improvisation #1
metadata.description:
This NFT includes only a sample of the original music, own it and go to the NFT page on KLOOV to listen to the Full Track https://kloov.com/klangforumwien/full-track/gerald-preinfalk-improvisation.

This NFT provides access to an exclusive saxophone recording performed by Gerald Preinfalk, in the framework of collaboration between Klangforum Wien, KLOOV and CultTech Accelerator. Hope you enjoy it!
